Heatapy Python framework for Computing transient heat transfer processes
  • Installation

  • Contributing

    Contributing

    You are more than welcome to contribute to this project. There are several ways to help: report bugs, write documentation, suggest new features, suggest new systems, code. For more information please contact djsilva@gmx.com.

    List of publications

    • D. J. Silva, J. S. Amaral, and V. S. Amaral, Heatrapy: A flexible Python framework for computing dynamic heat transfer processes involving caloric effects in 1.5D systems, SoftwareX, 7 (2018) 373.
    • D. J. Silva, J. Ventura, J. S. Amaral, and V. S. Amaral, Enhancing the temperature span of thermal switch‚Äêbased solid state magnetic refrigerators with field sweeping, Int. J. Energy Res., 43 (2019) 742.
    • D. J. Silva, J. S. Amaral, and V. S. Amaral, Cooling by sweeping: A new operation method to achieve ferroic refrigeration without fluids or thermally switchable components, Int. J. Refrig., 101 (2019) 91.
